QuestData.Title: Lunatic Lieutenants
QuestData.Description: It is time we learned more about our new enemy.$b$bOur scouts have identified a number of the Iron Horde's lieutenants. Their attack is too organized to be run by tribal knowledge alone. Surely their lieutenants have access to secret battleplans. $b$bYou are the only soldier I can trust with this mission, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's take a look at these battleplans.
